task.title: Starting a meeting
task.shortdesc: From the Meeting screen you can access meetings you have defined, scheduled, and more.

step.info:
A list of defined meetings opens under the following categories. If you know the name of the meeting, you can type it in the search field to locate it. You can use the filter, which you access at the bottom of the screen, to narrow the list of meetings.
My Meetings A list of meetings that you own.
Scheduled A list of scheduled meetings that you're a participant in.
Pinned A list meetings that you pinned as favorites. This is the same list of meetings that opens when you tap the meeting icon in a chat. With this list, you can send a meeting URL to chat partners.
Recent A list of the recent meetings that you joined.

step.cmd: Enter the meeting name or tap to be generate a name.
step.info: Meeting names must be unique and cannot contain any special characters, such as &, #, and *. To copy the meeting name, tap to copy the meeting name to the clipboard.
Depending on the type of meeting, you are prompted for log-in credentials. You are also prompted for audio and video preferences for the meeting.
